name: Crossword
description:
Get across to the finish line by walking on numbers! Each step you take advances the tiles by one number/letter forward. 

The random map algorithm is really bad, some of the maps might be unsolveable, and you might see a big clump of the same number too.

Submission for Trijam 91 with theme "There is safety in numbers". The player and flag icons were taken from game-icons.net

Controls: 

WASD and Arrow Keys - Movement

Space - Skip a turn
